name: Reemergence
description:
Game made for the GameDev.tv game jam. The theme was "Death is only the beginning".  Start your adventure in a serene platformer forest landscape but the adventure only begins there. Made with a buddy over the course of 9 days. Enjoy.

Supports both Keyboard & Mouse as well as Controller

Authors of the game are:

Skinward - https://skinward.itch.io/

Dirge - https://d1rg3dapyr0.itch.io/

Source files can be found at:

https://github.com/Skinward/GameDevGameJam
